An Example

We have time for only one!

class User
  def send_welcome_email
    # compose, format and send email
    # this takes a while. Don't make
    # the caller wait.
  end
end
user = User.new
user.send_welcome_email

This could take a while

Backgroundable

class User

  include TorqueBox::Messaging::Backgroundable

  def send_welcome_email
    # compose, format and send email
    # this takes a while. Don't make
    # the caller wait.
  end
end
user = User.new
user.background.send_welcome_email

Better

Always Backgrounded

class User
  include TorqueBox::Messaging::Backgroundable

  always_background :send_welcome_email

  def send_welcome_email
    # compose, format and send email
    # this takes a while. Don't make
    # the caller wait.
  end
end
user = User.new
user.send_welcome_email

Best!
